name: 0 - Intro
_source: speak;Emma; Emily, come on, we're going to be late!
speak;Emma; How can I?{w} They probably got us souvenirs from the other village!
speak;Emily; Okay, but we don't have to be in a rush to get there.
speak;Emily; You better take that back, Em{tgm}...{tgm}{w} You know I can beat you in a fist fight.
speak;Emma; You can't just threaten to fight people when you have a problem with them.
speak;Emily; Hasn't failed me so far.
speak;Marica; Look who decided to show up.{w} We gave your gifts to some kids since we thought you'd got eaten.
speak;Lily; Marica, don't tease the girls like that.{w} You know they hate it.
speak;Emma; It's not my fault that Emily was taking her sweet ass time!
speak;Emily; Oh, you've done it now, Emma!
speak;Emma; AHHHH!!!! GET OFF MEEEEE!!{c:wait;300} HAHA!! IT TICKLES!!!
speak;Emily; Shouldn't have said that, Em!{w} You had it coming!
speak;Sonia; Haha!{w} The moment I show up, you guys go right back to doing this, huh?{w} You two never change!
speak;Sonia; You girls look like you're having a lively time.{w} As hot-headed as ever, I see, Emily.
speak;Emily; Ha!{w} You know me!{w} When I see a problem, I can't just stand by and do nothing.
speak;Lily; Seems like you might've been the problem today, though?
speak;Emily; H-hey, don't take Em's side!
speak;Lily; I'm taking <iconvo>an</> Em's side either way{tgm}...
speak;Sonia; Haha!{w} Here, Emma, I managed to get you your favorite snack.
speak;Emma; Yay! My favorite cookies!{w} Thank you!
speak;Sonia; Don't think I forgot about you either, Emily.{w} I got a necklace for you.
speak;Emily; Wow{tgm}...{tgm} This is so fancy{tgm}...{w}
speak;Lily; Don't ask what we had to do to get it.
speak;Sonia; Haha{tgm}...{tgm}{c:expression;Sonia;NoSmile} Don't tell me you're still bitter about that, are you?
speak;Lily; Hmph, it's about time I got back to the clinic.{w} I'll see you guys later.
speak;Marica; Ah, well, I'll talk to you guys some more when I'm free.
speak;Marica; (*Psst* Emily, if you wanted to take Emma to that hunting path up north,{w} now's the time.)
speak;Emily; (You're right!{w} Please don't tell our mother about it.{w} We'll be back before you know it!)
speak;Emily; Hey Em, I've got another surprise for you. All you have to do is follow me.
speak;Emma; Another surprise?! Alright, lead the way.
speak;SoldierBlue;Sonia, I see something coming this way!
speak;Caroline; I saw the monsters coming in the distance and rushed here as fast as I could.{w} Where are Emma and Emily?!
speak;Sonia; Oh, er{tgm}...{c:wait;300} They went to the hunting grounds.
speak;Caroline; They what?!{w} Marica, Sonia, defend the village.{w} I have to go after them!
